body: If you are reporting a problem, please make sure the following information are provided: **Expected behavior and actual behavior:** ``` 2019-07-17T13:38:38Z [INFO] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:95]: client for source registry [type: azure-acr, URL: https://harbor.azurecr.io, insecure: false] created 2019-07-17T13:38:38Z [INFO] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:105]: client for destination registry [type: harbor, URL: http://core:8080, insecure: true] created 2019-07-17T13:38:38Z [INFO] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:138]: copying dev/busybox:[1.30.0](source registry) to develop/busybox:[1.30.0](destination registry)... 2019-07-17T13:38:38Z [INFO] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:157]: copying dev/busybox:1.30.0(source registry) to develop/busybox:1.30.0(destination registry)... 2019-07-17T13:38:38Z [INFO] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:261]: pulling the manifest of image dev/busybox:1.30.0 ... 2019-07-17T13:38:38Z [INFO] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:272]: the manifest of image dev/busybox:1.30.0 pulled 2019-07-17T13:38:38Z [INFO] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:231]: copying the blob sha256:3a093384ac306cbac30b67f1585e12b30ab1a899374dabc3170b9bca246f1444... 2019-07-17T13:47:02Z [ERROR] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:244]: failed to pulling the blob sha256:3a093384ac306cbac30b67f1585e12b30ab1a899374dabc3170b9bca246f1444: http error: code 400, message 锘� InvalidAuthenticationInfoAuthentication information is not given in the correct format. Check the value of Authorization header. RequestId:bd529764-401e-00f6-3fa5-3c01a4000000 Time:2019-07-17T13:46:00.6942963Z 2019-07-17T13:47:02Z [ERROR] [/replication/transfer/image/transfer.go:143]: http error: code 400, message 锘� InvalidAuthenticationInfoAuthentication information is not given in the correct format. Check the value of Authorization header. RequestId:bd529764-401e-00f6-3fa5-3c01a4000000 Time:2019-07-17T13:46:00.6942963Z ``` **Steps to reproduce the problem:** Please provide the steps to reproduce this problem. **Versions:** Please specify the versions of following systems. - harbor version: [x.x.x] - docker engine version: [y.y.y] - docker-compose version: [z.z.z] **Additional context:** * **Harbor config files:** You can get them by packaging `harbor.cfg` and files in the same directory, including subdirectory. * **Log files:** You can get them by package the `/var/log/harbor/` .
title: Pull-based replication error for Azure ACR
